content: in a legal case that lasted for 4 years the court of appeal in palermo made a final ruling the court partially granted the main counter appeals and declared the right of one party to receive their share of the inheritance the court ordered the appellants to pay this party their share and also ordered the party to pay another party a specific amount certain claims were declared inadmissible and the court offset the legal costs of the proceedings the courtappointed expert assessed the assets involved in the inheritance and determined their value the court found that there had been a violation of the partys reserved share and ordered the division of the assets accordingly the court also addressed the use of certain properties and the restitution of income from those properties the court determined the amounts owed by each party and ordered the offsetting of mutual obligations the court also addressed the reimbursement of expenses related to the succession and determined the allocation of legal costs the final ruling was made by the court of appeal in palermo on november 30 2022

metadata.CASE_ID: Court of Appeal of Palermo, sec. II, 16/12/2022
